name: Get The Bees
description:
• How to play:
  1.  Space: Jump.
  2. Left Control: Shoot.
  3. A: Move Left.
  4. D: Move Right.
  5. After finishing the game, click the "Stats" button to see your stats.
  • Rules:
  1. Shoot the bees to eleminate them.
  2. The honey will disapear after the bee touch it.
  3. After the bees touched all four honeys you will lose.
